text: Nickelodeon Movies is the motion picture production arm of children's cable channel Nickelodeon, originally launched on February 25, 1995. == Released Films == #Harriet The Spy - Wednesday, July 10, 1996 #Good Burger - Friday, July 25, 1997 #The Rugrats Movie - Friday, November 20, 1998 #Snow Day - Friday, February 11, 2000 #Rugrats in Paris: The Movie - Friday, November 17, 2000 #The Big Knights: The Movie - Friday, December 8, 2000 #Blazing Dragons: The Movie - Friday, March 30, 2001 #Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius - Friday, December 21, 2001 #Clockstoppers - Friday, March 29, 2002 #Hey Arnold!: The Movie - Friday, June 28, 2002 #The Wild Thornberrys Movie - Friday, December 20, 2002 #The Lizzie McGuire Movie - Friday, May 2, 2003 #Rugrats Go Wild - Friday, June 13, 2003 #The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie - Friday, November 19, 2004 #Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events - Friday, December 17, 2004 #Mad Hot Ballroom - Friday, May 13, 2005 #Yours, Mine & Ours - Wednesday, November 23, 2005 #Nacho Libre - Friday, June 16, 2006 #Barnyard - Friday, August 4, 2006 #Charlotte’s Web - Friday, December 15, 2006 #The Spiderwick Chronicles - Thursday, February 14, 2008 #Angus, Thongs and Perfect Snogging - Friday, July 25, 2008 #Hotel for Dogs - Friday, January 16, 2009 #Imagine That - Friday, June 12, 2009 #The Last Airbender - Thursday, July 1, 2010 #Rango - Friday, March 4, 2011 #The Adventures of Tintin - Wednesday, December 21, 2011 #Fun Size - Friday, October 26, 2012 #Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Friday, August 8, 2014 #The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water - Friday, February 6, 2015 #Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows - Friday, June 3, 2016 #Monster Trucks - Friday, January 13, 2017 #T.U.F.F. Puppy: The Movie - Friday, September 15, 2017 #The Loud House: The First Movie - Friday, October 27, 2017 #Bunsen Is A Beast!: The Movie - Friday, September 14, 2018 #Wonder Park - Friday, March 15, 2019 #Dora and the Lost City of Gold - Friday, August 9, 2019 #Playing with Fire - Friday, November 8, 2019 #The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge on the Run - Friday, August 14, 2020, Thursday November 5th, 2020 (Internationally, including Poland and the UK), March 4, 2021 (USA) #PAW Patrol: The Movie - Friday, August 20, 2021 #The Loud House Movie - Friday, August 20, 2021 #The J Team - Friday, September 3, 2021 #A Loud House Christmas - Friday, November 26, 2021 #Paws of Fury: The Legend of Hank - Friday, July 15, 2022 #Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Movie - Friday, August 5, 2022 #Monster High: The Movie - Thursday, October 6, 2022 #Blue's Big City Adventure - Friday, November 18, 2022 #Fantasy Football - Friday, November 25, 2022 #Snow Day - Friday, December 16, 2022 #Zoey 102 - Thursday, July 27, 2023 #Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem - Wednesday, August 2, 2023 #A Really Haunted Loud House - Thursday, September 28, 2023 #PAW Patrol: The Mighty Movie - Friday, September 29, 2023 #Monster High 2 - Thursday, October 5, 2023 #Good Burger 2 - Wednesday, November 22, 2023 #Baby Shark's Big Movie - Friday, December 8, 2023 #The Thundermans Return - Thursday, March 7, 2024 #The Casagrandes Movie - Friday, March 22, 2024 #No Time to Spy: A Loud House Movie Friday, June 21, 2024 === Upcoming films === Title Release date Director(s) Writer(s) Producer(s) Composer(s) Co- production with Animation services Saving Bikini Bottom: The Sandy Cheeks Movie 2024 Liza Johnson Kaz (story) \----Kaz & Tom Stern (screenplay) TBA Paramount Animation United Plankton Pictures; Frederator Studios Nickelodeon Animation Studios Yeson Animation Studios == Development == * Untitled Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles new live-action film * Untitled second and third SpongeBob SquarePants spin-off films * Untitled Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem sequel * Untitled The Loud House new live- action/animated film * Untitled Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius sequel ==History== In 1993, they wanted to release movies after Rugrats (planned for a fall 1994 release), Doug (planned for a spring 1995 release) and Ren and Stimpy (planned for a summer 1995 release), but all of those got cancelled and scrapped, didn't make movies until 1996, with the first film was Harriet the Spy on July 10, 1996, Paramount first theatrically animated movie was The Rugrats Movie was released on November 20, 1998, it’s latest release was Good Burger 2 on November 22, 2023; with their next release being Saving Bikini Bottom: The Sandy Cheeks Movie on 2024. ==Film list== Title Release Date Production Company(s) Budget Gross Harriet the Spy July 10, 1996 Paramount / Rastar $13 million $26,570,048 Good Burger July 25, 1997 Paramount / Tollin/Robbins Productions $9 million $23,712,993 The Rugrats Movie November 20, 1998 Paramount / Klasky Csupo $24 million $140,894,675 Snow Day February 11, 2000 Paramount / C.O.R.E.
